subject: Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: Mazdzer hung on to win the USA Luge national championships in Lake Placid, N.Y., for the sixth time, edging Tucker West by 0.076 of a second over the four-run competition.
snippet: Mazdzer hung on to win the USA Luge national championships in Lake Placid, N.Y., for the sixth time, edging Tucker West by 0.076 of a second over the four-run competition.
